            overflow: hidden;

        }

        .sidebar {

        }

        .sidebar h3 {
            margin-bottom: 15px;

            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }

        .upload-zone {
            border: 3px dashed #667eea;
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 30px 20px;
            text-align: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #f8f9ff, #ffffff);
        }

        .upload-zone:hover {
            border-color: #764ba2;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #f0f2ff, #f8f9ff);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

        .upload-zone.dragover {
            border-color: #28a745;
            background: #f8fff8;
        }

        .upload-icon {
            font-size: 3rem;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            color: #667eea;
        }

        .template-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 10px;
            max-height: 400px;
            overflow-y: auto;
        }

        .template-item {
            aspect-ratio: 1;
            border: 2px solid #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 12px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            overflow: hidden;
            position: relative;
            background: #f8f9fa;
        }

        .template-item:hover {
            border-color: #667eea;
            transform: scale(1.05);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.3);
        }

        .template-item.selected {
            border-color: #667eea;
            box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.5);
        }

        .template-item img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        .canvas-area {
            padding: 20px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            background: #ffffff;
        }

        .preview-container {
            position: relative;
            max-width: 100%;
            max-height: 500px;
            border-radius: 15px;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: 0 15px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
        }

        .mockup-canvas {
            position: relative;
            background: #f8f9fa;
            border-radius: 15px;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .mockup-image {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            display: block;
        }

        .design-overlay {
            position: absolute;
            border: 2px dashed rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.8);
            cursor: move;
            background: rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.1);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .design-overlay:hover {
            background: rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.2);
        }

        .design-overlay img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: contain;
            opacity: 0.9;
        }

        .controls {
            padding: 20px;
            background: #f8f9fa;
            border-left: 1px solid #e9ecef;
        }

        .control-group {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .control-group label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #495057;
        }

        .slider {
            width: 100%;
            height: 6px;
            border-radius: 3px;
            background: #e9ecef;
            outline: none;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

            height: 20px;

            background: #667eea;

        .btn-primary {

        .btn-primary:hover {

            box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.4);
        }

        .btn-secondary {
            background: #6c757d;
            color: white;
        }

        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: #5a6268;
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }

            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            padding: 15px;
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
            border-radius: 12px;
            color: white;
        }

        .no-selection {
            text-align: center;
            color: #6c757d;
            font-style: italic;
            padding: 40px;
        }

        .color-picker {
            width: 100%;
            height: 40px;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 8px;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        #uploadedImage {
            display: none;
        }

        @media (max-width: 1200px) {
            .main-content {
                grid-template-columns: 250px 1fr 250px;
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 992px) {

                grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .header h1 {
                font-size: 2rem;
            }
            
            .template-grid {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            }
